attributes.action: Let our English neighbours vote, Scotland IN or OUT of the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
The English know that Scotland has no oil left.
They have been told we are all scroungers and take more than we give.
They know we are not racist and enjoy multiculturalism so why not send 'THEM' up here. 
We get free prescriptions and you don't,  that's surely not fare!
Free tuition, why do we get that? You guys in England pay for that I guess. 
You voted to 'take your country back', well you didn't you still have Scottish MP's in Westminster telling you what you can and can't do!
Vote us out!
attributes.background:
I personally think that the people of England are continually lied to by the uk government. Why don't they want us to go it on our own? You, the good people of England have voted to leave the EU, I applaud you on your success. Now keep it going,vote Scotland to leave the UK!
A simple YES or no.
